ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:45:21 [Issue ID 4000-111792] urn:comicvine:4000-111792 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 20:58:33. [Issue ID 111792]
ComicInfo.Summary: When he's not leadin' mass, he's out kickin' ass! After the Rapture the sole protector of the sinning masses is BATTLE POPE, and his trusty sidekick, Jesus. They're the last line of defense in a world overrun with demons and depravity. Reprinting ROBERT KIRKMAN's first published work, now in stunning full color, with a brand new cover by original artist TONY MOORE and original cover colorist VAL STAPLES. Just in time for the book's Fifth Anniversary!
ComicInfo.Title: Battle Pope
